questions: Q. 1. Give examples of abiotic resources ?
Q. 2. In which type of energy is the state of Rajasthan rich ?
Q. 3. Which cold desert is relatively isolated from the rest of the country ?
Q. 4. What are resources which are found in a region but have not been utilised called ?
Q. 5. Which resources are surveyed and determined on the basis of their quantity and quality for utilisation ?
Q. 6. Which relief features of India has 30 percent of the total surface area of country ?
Q. 7. Give examples of Biotic resources ?
answers: Ans. Human beings, flora, fauna, fisheries, livestock, etc.
